瑤.definition: jade; precious stone; mother-of-pearl; nacre; precious; used a complementary honorific

瑤之圃.definition: jade garden of celestial ruler; paradise

瑤族.definition: Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia

瑤池.definition: the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母

瑤海.definition: Yaohai, a district of Hefei City 合肥市[He2fei2 Shi4], Anhui

瑤海區.definition: Yaohai, a district of Hefei City 合肥市[He2fei2 Shi4], Anhui
